compliance_and_approval.approved_for_use_in: United States of America (as printed on brochure)

range_segments.notes: Catalogue section lists models for air conditioners with the same spec fields across models.
Catalogue section lists models for refrigerators and general-purpose/mainline loads with the same spec fields across models.

common_model_spec_fields_schema.series: string (e.g., series name shown in the table)

capacity.notes: AC models may also mention supported tonnage in the KVA rating field (e.g., 'up to X ton').

mrp.notes: Listed as MRP in the table.

application_text_patterns_seen_in_catalo: Air conditioner usage (e.g., 1.5 ton / 2.0 ton / etc. as listed per model)
Refrigerator usage by amp + fridge capacity (e.g., '2 Amp, 1 Ref. up to 300L')
Multi-appliance loads (deep freezer, water cooler, air cooler, UPS, etc.)
General purpose mainline (home load examples like rooms/lights/fans/TV/washing machine)
